cause.description:
Well if we can get enough members maybe we can get green day's attention and get billie joe motivated to get off his lazy ass and get started on a new album instead of re-releasing old albums and re-making old songs and re-makign cartoon themes. seriously comon wtf. do it for the fans billie joe
1. Billie joe needs to write a new song (at least 10 for a new album)
cause.mission: Motivate billie joe to write new songs for a new green day album
cause.name: Billie joe, stop writing stupid singles and write some new songs for some new albums!
